sys_ux_client_script.name: addUsertoReadList

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_fa32625c8c2202106551dd57ebaed2b2
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="">7232625ccd2202106388cefc179175b6</macroponent><name>addUsertoReadList</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
 
    var readUsers =  api.data.look_up_record_1.result.list_of_read_users.value;
    var loggedInUser = api.data.logged_in_user_1.output.user;
    var updateReadUsers = '';
    if (readUsers) {
        readUsers = readUsers.toString();
        if (readUsers.indexOf(loggedInUser) == -1) {
            updateReadUsers = [readUsers, ',', loggedInUser].join('');
        } else {
            return;
        }
    } else {
        updateReadUsers = [loggedInUser].join('');
    }
    
    var templateFields = ['list_of_read_users', '=', updateReadUsers].join('');
    api.data.update_record_1.execute({
        table: api.context.props.table,
        recordId: api.context.props.sysId,
        templateFields
    });



}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-29 17:32:05</sys_created_on><sys_id>fa32625c8c2202106551dd57ebaed2b2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>addUsertoReadList</sys_name><sys_package display_value="My Template App" source="x_1434439_my_tem_0">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="My Template App">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_fa32625c8c2202106551dd57ebaed2b2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-29 17:32:05</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
